101 Dalmatians is a 1996 American live-action family comedy film based on Walt 
Disney's 1961 animation adaptation of Dodie Smith's 1956 novel The Hundred 
and One Dalmatians. Directed by Stephen Herek and co-produced by John 
Hughes and Ricardo Mestres, it stars Glenn Close, ... Anita, inspired by her 
dalmatian, designs a coat made with spotted fur.
